title: STAT+: Biotech doubles financing in quest to silence genes behind neurological diseases
description: Aerska, a startup developing treatments to silence the problematic genes that cause various brain diseases, has raised $39 million in financing.
content: Aerska, a startup developing treatments to silence the problematic genes that cause various brain diseases, has raised $39 million in financing.
